alert.note: Alert for Cotton; Garvin; Jackson; Stephens; Tillman (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued May 31 at 9:39PM CDT until June 01 at 3:00AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT THROUGH LATE WEDNESDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is possible. * WHERE...Portions of southern Oklahoma and southwest Oklahoma, including the following counties, in southern Oklahoma, Garvin and Stephens. In southwest Oklahoma, Cotton, Jackson and Tillman. * WHEN...Through late Wednesday night. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. Flooding may occur in poor drainage and urban areas. Low-water crossings may be flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Storms with heavy rainfall will be seen over portions of the flood watch area Tuesday evening and Tuesday night, with additional storms with heavy rain possible through Wednesday evening. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be alert for possible Flood Warnings. Those living in areas prone to flooding should be prepared to take action should flooding develop.
